trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref> event of a specific instance of the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref> or static <xref href="System.Web.SiteMap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve"></xref>事件的特定实例<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapProvider"></xref>或静态<xref href="System.Web.SiteMap"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Web.SiteMap> class exposes the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve> event of the default site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 静态<xref:System.Web.SiteMap>类会公开<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve>的默认站点地图提供商提供的事件。</xref:System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve> </xref:System.Web.SiteMap>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
